body_html:
Perhaps my blog post could help you understand a bit more: http://terrytangyuan.github.io/2016/07/08/understand-and-build-tensorflow-estimator/

We switched to use SessionRunHook in Estimator which is why you cannot find the ._session.
This does require some reading of the source code instead of just reading from the docs. Hope this helps.
body_text:
Perhaps my blog post could help you understand a bit more: http://terrytangyuan.github.io/2016/07/08/understand-and-build-tensorflow-estimator/
We switched to use SessionRunHook in Estimator which is why you cannot find the ._session.

body:
Perhaps my blog post could help you understand a bit more: http://terrytangyuan.github.io/2016/07/08/understand-and-build-tensorflow-estimator/

We switched to use [SessionRunHook](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/session_run_hook.py) in Estimator which is why you cannot find the `._session`. 
This does require some reading of the source code instead of just reading from the docs. Hope this helps.
